targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN userinterface_name = 'horizon_android_mobile' THEN device_name END) as "Android Mobile Devices",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN userinterface_name = 'horizon_tv' THEN device_name END) as "Horizon TV Devices",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN userinterface_name = 'iad_gui' THEN device_name END) as "IAD GUI Devices",
  COUNT(DISTINCT device_name) as "Total Devices",
  COUNT(DISTINCT metadata->'info'->>'serial_number') as "Unique Serials",
  COUNT(*) as "Total Scans",
  COUNT(DISTINCT metadata->'info'->>'software_version') as "Firmware Versions"
FROM script_results 
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))

SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_name)
  device_name as "Device",
  userinterface_name as "User Interface",
  host_name as "Host",
  metadata->'info' as "Device Info (JSON)",
  started_at as "Last Scanned",
  ROUND(execution_time_ms::decimal / 1000, 1) as "Duration (s)",
  html_report_r2_url as "Report"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND metadata->'info' IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
ORDER BY device_name, started_at DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_name)
  device_name as "Device",
  userinterface_name as "UI",
  host_name as "Host",
  metadata->'info'->>'build_version' as "Build Version",
  metadata->'info'->>'hardware_version' as "HW Version",
  metadata->'info'->>'software_version' as "SW Version",
  metadata->'info'->>'serial_number_stb' as "Serial STB",
  metadata->'info'->>'application_version' as "App Version",
  started_at as "Last Scanned",
  ROUND(execution_time_ms::decimal / 1000, 1) as "Duration (s)",
  html_report_r2_url as "Report"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
  AND userinterface_name = 'horizon_tv'
ORDER BY device_name, started_at DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_name)
  device_name as "Device",
  userinterface_name as "UI",
  host_name as "Host",
  metadata->'info'->>'OS' as "OS",
  metadata->'info'->>'OV' as "OV",
  metadata->'info'->>'Build' as "Build",
  metadata->'info'->>'Device' as "Device Type",
  metadata->'info'->>'Conviva' as "Conviva",
  metadata->'info'->>'CPE_1_ID' as "CPE 1 ID",
  metadata->'info'->>'CPE_2_ID' as "CPE 2 ID",
  metadata->'info'->>'Device_IP' as "Device IP",
  metadata->'info'->>'Customer_HH' as "Customer HH",
  metadata->'info'->>'Video_Player' as "Video Player",
  metadata->'info'->>'Connection_Type' as "Connection",
  metadata->'info'->>'Mqtt_Cpe_Status' as "MQTT CPE Status",
  metadata->'info'->>'Mqtt_Broker_Status' as "MQTT Broker",
  metadata->'info'->>'OV_Disk_Status' as "OV Disk",
  metadata->'info'->>'OV_Engine_State' as "OV Engine",
  metadata->'info'->>'OV_Power_Status' as "OV Power",
  metadata->'info'->>'OV_Network_Status' as "OV Network",
  metadata->'info'->>'OV_Download_Enabled' as "OV Download",
  metadata->'info'->>'Last_MQTT_status_check' as "Last MQTT Check",
  started_at as "Last Scanned",
  ROUND(execution_time_ms::decimal / 1000, 1) as "Duration (s)",
  html_report_r2_url as "Report"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
  AND userinterface_name = 'horizon_android_mobile'
ORDER BY device_name, started_at DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_name)
  device_name as "Device",
  userinterface_name as "UI",
  host_name as "Host",
  metadata->'info'->>'Hardware_version' as "HW Version",
  metadata->'info'->>'Software_version' as "SW Version",
  metadata->'info'->>'Cable_modem_serial_number' as "Serial Number",
  metadata->'info'->>'MAC_address' as "MAC Address",
  metadata->'info'->>'IPv4_address' as "IPv4 Address",
  metadata->'info'->>'Default_gateway' as "Gateway",
  metadata->'info'->>'IPv4_DNS_servers' as "DNS Servers",
  metadata->'info'->>'System_up_time' as "System Uptime",
  metadata->'info'->>'IPv4_lease_expire' as "Lease Expire",
  metadata->'info'->>'Network_access' as "Network Access",
  metadata->'info'->>'Standard_specification_compliant' as "DOCSIS",
  started_at as "Last Scanned",
  ROUND(execution_time_ms::decimal / 1000, 1) as "Duration (s)",
  html_report_r2_url as "Report"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
  AND userinterface_name = 'iad_gui'
ORDER BY device_name, started_at DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_name)
  device_name as "Device",
  userinterface_name as "UI",
  host_name as "Host",
  metadata->'info'->>'device' as "Device Type",
  metadata->'info'->>'conviva' as "Conviva",
  metadata->'info'->>'video_player' as "Video Player",
  metadata->'info'->>'connection_type' as "Connection Time",
  metadata->'info'->>'settings' as "Settings",
  metadata->'info'->>'information' as "Information",
  metadata->'info'->>'en' as "Info Text",
  metadata->'info'->>'©_dolby_audio' as "Dolby Audio",
  started_at as "Last Scanned",
  ROUND(execution_time_ms::decimal / 1000, 1) as "Duration (s)",
  html_report_r2_url as "Report"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
  AND userinterface_name = 'horizon_android_tv'
ORDER BY device_name, started_at DESC

SELECT 
  device_name as "Device",
  userinterface_name as "User Interface",
  host_name as "Host",
  metadata->'info' as "Device Info (JSON)",
  started_at as "Scanned At",
  ROUND(execution_time_ms::decimal / 1000, 1) as "Duration (s)",
  html_report_r2_url as "Report"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND metadata->'info' IS NOT NULL
  AND started_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY started_at DESC
LIMIT 500

list.label: User Interface
list.name: user_interface
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT userinterface_name FROM script_results WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info') AND userinterface_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY userinterface_name

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT host_name FROM script_results WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info') ORDER BY host_name

list.label: Device Name
list.name: device_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT device_name FROM script_results WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info') ORDER BY device_name
